import React, { useContext } from 'react' import { useRouter } from 'next/router' import NavItem from './nav-item' import { World } from '../icons' import styles from './navigation.module.css' import { AuthContext } from '../../store/auth' const Navigation = () => { const router = useRouter() const { authState, isAdmin } = useContext(AuthContext) return (
Askem Tags Users Groups {isAdmin() && ( Administator )}
) } export default Navigation
